title: NGP-Scientific-DataDescriptor-minISA-schema: StudyDescriptor
description: An entity that helps an agent perform an activity.

repositories.description: The primary publication(s) associated with the Scientific Data Descriptor, usually describing how the dataset was produced

ontologySourceReferences.description: The primary publication(s) associated with the Scientific Data Descriptor, usually describing how the dataset was produced

relatedPublications.description: The primary publication(s) associated with the Scientific Data Descriptor, usually describing how the dataset was produced

stuydCharacteristics.description: elements to describe the properties of the study participants or subjects

organism.description: an element to describe the taxonomic information of the study participants or subjects

environmentType.description: an element to describe the envorinmental properties, information of the study participants or subjects or specimens

geographicalLocation.description: an element to describe the geographical origin, information of the study participants or subjects or specimens

factors.description: The list of study's independent variables, aka predictor variables if applicable

assays.description: The list of study's dependent variables, aka response variables if applicable

commments.description: A list of key value pairs to provide any further annotation
